body: "It would be extremely poor of me to compare our situation with that of the people in Egypt. They have legitimate reasons to demand a change and have stood by the courage of their convictions": Still, Coffeewallah wishes that Trinbagonians would "approach our issues with the single-mindedness [with which we] party."
original_body: "It would be extremely poor of me to compare our situation with that of the people in Egypt. They have legitimate reasons to demand a change and have stood by the courage of their convictions": Still, Coffeewallah wishes that Trinbagonians would "approach our issues with the single-mindedness [with which we] party."
title: Trinidad & Tobago: What Egypt Can Teach Us

sentence: "It would be extremely poor of me to compare our situation with that of the people in Egypt.

They have legitimate reasons to demand a change and have stood by the courage of their convictions": Still, Coffeewallah wishes that Trinbagonians would "approach our issues with the single-mindedness [with which we] party."
